titleStmt.title: Sermons preach'd upon several occasions. By John Lord Archbishop of Canterbury. The fourth volume
titleStmt.author: Tillotson, John, 1630-1694.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for B. Aylmer at the Three Pigeons against the Royal-Exchange in Cornhill; and W. Rogers at the Sun against St. Dunstan's Church in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: With a frontispiece portrait of John Tillotson signed R White sculpt.
Text and register are continuous despite pagination.
Each of the twelve sermons has a divisional title page.
reproduction of the original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.

place.placeName: the Sun against St. Dunstan's Church in Fleetstreet
the Three Pigeons against the Royal-Exchange in Cornhill;
